overview:
Miroslav Vukovic is an entrepreneur focused on Internet and new technologies. He had worked in government industry and IT sector as a consultant, team leader, educator and developer on numerous national and international IT projects.

Miroslavâ€™s research interests include cryptography, security, cloud computing and distributed data processing.

Currently, he works as a CEO in a company he founded, which currently develops Internet oriented solutions, while he is also acting as an advisor for other companies.
